title: 运动员与教练练习题
content:
例题概况

  • 乒乓球运动员和篮球运动员
  • 乒乓球教练和篮球教练
  • 为了出国交流,跟乒乓球相关的人员都需要学习英语
  • 分析 这个案例哪些需要抽象类,哪些接口,哪些具体类

例题分析

抽象类：人、运动员、教练
具体类：乒乓球运动员、篮球运动员、乒乓球教练、篮球教练
接口：学习英语—乒乓球运动员、乒乓球教练

例题实现

abstract class Person{
	private String name;
	private int age;
	public abstract void eat();
	public void sleep() {
		System.out.println("睡觉");
	}
	public String getName() {
		return name;
	}
	public void setName(String name) {
		this.name = name;
	}
	public int getAge() {
		return age;
	}
	public void setAge(int age) {
		this.age = age;
	}
	public Person() {}
	public Person(String name,int age) {
		this.name = name;
		this.age = age;
	}
}
abstract class Player extends Person{
	public Player() {}
	public Player(String name,int age) {
		super(name,age);
	}
	public abstract void study();
}
abstract class Coach extends Person{
	public Coach() {}
	public Coach(String name,int age) {
		super(name,age);
	}
	public abstract void teach();
}

class BasketballPlayer extends Player{
	public BasketballPlayer() {}
	public BasketballPlayer(String name,int age) {
		super(name,age);
	}
	public void eat() {
		System.out.println("篮球运动员吃的多");
	}
	public void study() {
		System.out.println("篮球运动员学习新的篮球技巧");
	}
}

class PingpangPlayer extends Player implements LearnEnglish{
	public PingpangPlayer() {}
	public PingpangPlayer(String name,int age) {
		super(name,age);
	}
	public void eat() {
		System.out.println("乒乓球运动员吃的少");
	}
	public void study() {
		System.out.println("乒乓球运动员学习新的篮球技巧");
	}
	public void learn() {
		System.out.println("运动员学习英语");
	}
}

class BasketballCoach extends Coach{
	public BasketballCoach() {}
	public BasketballCoach(String name,int age) {
		super(name,age);
	}
	public void eat() {
		System.out.println("篮球教练吃的少");
	}
	public void teach() {
		System.out.println("篮球教练教新的战术");
	}
}
class PingpangCoach extends Coach implements LearnEnglish{
	public PingpangCoach() {}
	public PingpangCoach(String name,int age) {
		super(name,age);
	}
	public void eat() {
		System.out.println("乒乓球教练吃的少");
	}
	public void teach() {
		System.out.println("乒乓球教练教新的战术");
	}
	public void learn() {
		System.out.println("教练学习英语");
	}
}
interface LearnEnglish{
	public abstract void learn();
}


public class Test {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		BasketballPlayer bp = new BasketballPlayer();
		bp.setAge(25);
		bp.setName("艾弗森");
		System.out.println(bp.getName()+"是篮球运动员今年"+bp.getAge()+"岁");
		bp.eat();
		bp.sleep();
		bp.study();
		System.out.println("-------------------");
		BasketballCoach bc = new BasketballCoach();
		bc.setAge(55);
		bc.setName("布朗");
		System.out.println(bc.getName()+"是篮球教练今年"+bc.getAge()+"岁");
		bc.eat();
		bc.sleep();
		bc.teach();
		System.out.println("-------------------");
		PingpangPlayer pp = new PingpangPlayer();
		pp.setAge(22);
		pp.setName("张怡宁");
		System.out.println(pp.getName()+"是乒乓球运动员今年"+pp.getAge()+"岁");
		pp.eat();
		pp.sleep();
		pp.study();
		pp.learn();
		System.out.println("-------------------");
		PingpangCoach pc = new PingpangCoach();
		pc.setAge(43);
		pc.setName("刘国梁");
		System.out.println(pc.getName()+"是乒乓球教练今年"+pc.getAge()+"岁");
		pc.eat();
		pc.sleep();
		pc.teach();
		pc.learn();
		System.out.println("-------------------");
	}
}
